text: Douglas Schoolfield Cramer (August 22, 1931 â€“ June 7, 2021) was an American television producer. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky. Cramer worked for Paramount Television and Spelling Television. Cramer was known for producing Mission: Impossible, The Brady Bunch, and Dynasty. Cramer died of heart and kidney failure on June 7, 2021 on Martha's Vineyard in Massachusetts at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American television producers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Businesspeople from Kentucky Category:People from Louisville, Kentucky
title: Douglas S. Cramer
